alert.note: Alert for Barber (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 16 at 10:16PM CDT until July 16 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL BARBER COUNTY... At 1016 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Medicine Lodge, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. At 1009 PM CDT, golf ball size hail was reported in Lake City. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Barber County. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
